genius.description: Make a password into a goal of yours so you constantly have to be reminded of it.
When buying something online only read the reviews that gave it 3 stars, they are usually the most honest about pros and cons.
When starting a game of 'rock paper scissors' always start with paper. Most people start with rock as it is the shape the hand easily forms.
Learning a new language? Try to find a translation of your favorite book when you were 9-12.
Need to test a printer? Print the Google homepage, it has all the colors and uses almost no ink.
When buying a romantic card, get two. Write the inscription from card A into card B and pretend you can write sweet things.
Find a brand of socks you like. Throw away all your others and only buy that brand/color. No more mismatched socks, ever.
If you find a hair in your food, heavily salt it before sending it back to the kitchen to make sure you got a new order.
A person usually makes a lot of hand gestures when telling a true story. When telling a lie a persons hands will stay noticeably still.
If your girlfriend catches you looking at another woman, turn to her and say, I am glad you do not dress like that.
Microwave a Nature Valley bar for thirty seconds to prevent crumbs when you eat it.
Ever wonder why phone cords are so short? Using your phone while it is charging can damage the battery.
Leave studying to the very last minute? Your best chance of passing is to study the first and last 20% of the syllabus.
When throwing a punch, clench your fist only at the last second. You lose a lot of power clenching throughout the swing.
Music is so influential on the brain that the type you listen to actually has the ability to change the way you think and look at the world.
When signing up for a website, do not answer the security questions honestly always use the same wrong answers for max security.
There is a free website called 'essaytyper' that lets you type a topic and it will write the paper for you in minutes.
Memorizing songs is extremely Health & Fitnessy for your brain and will improve your mental capacity.
Looking for something? Scan right to left with your eyes. You will pick up more since your brain isn't used to reading that way.
Before he even speaks, the way a man stands (slouching or not) accounts for 80% of a woman's first impression.
Think of being with someone you like/love the moment before you get your picture taken... perfect natural smiles everytime.
A high GPA looks good on paper, but networking and building friendships is what gets you a job.
Safety tip: if you ever have to park in a city at night, park in front of a bank. Why? They are lit up and have cameras everywhere.
Eating chocolate while studying math can improve your math skills.
Do not put your feet up on a car's dashboard. Airbags go off like small bombs and it can easily break both of your legs.
Playing a musical instrument has been known to raise a person's I.Q. by as much as 5 points.
Playing with puppies and kittens relieves stress and can help students perform better on exams.
Smile before answering the phone. It will make you sound happier and lead to a better conversation.
Grocery stores stack their product by sell-by date, which means the oldest food's in the front. Grab the fresh food in the back!
When studying a certain subject, pretend that you'll have to teach the material, this will help you pay more attention.
Start changing your password every week to a difficult word like 'photosynthesis' to learn how to spell it (great for kids).
Studying or working in your room? Keep your shoes on. Your mind associate having your shoes on with being busy.
At a restaurant? Wash your hands after ordering. The menu is generally the dirtiest thing you can touch!
Never date anyone who talks smoothly around you from the start because if someone likes you they should be a little nervous.
Bill Gates Method: Hire the laziest person to do the hardest job, because they'll find an easiest way to do it.
If you need to get a gift for a girl, check out her Pinterest account. You will find ideas within seconds.
Want to prank your friends? Freeze Mentos in ice cubes. Serve them time bomb sodas.
Putting batteries in the refrigerator for a day before using them will double their lifespan.
If you lose something in your room, take a picture of your room, put it on Facebook and have friends play 'I spy'.
Don't burn yourself in those hard to reach candles, light a stick of spaghetti and light the wick with that.
Lending someone your pen? Keep the cap. No one accidentally keeps a pen without the cap.
When camping, strap a head light to a gallon jug of water. The tent will fill with ambient light.
You can use a hair straightener as a collar iron.
Put your nail polish in the fridge for 15 minutes before you apply it as it goes on smoother.
Apply a generous amount of crushed aspirin onto a wart. Cover the wart with duct tape. The wart will disappear.
If you call your cable company and say you want more paid channels but haven't decided which ones, they'll give you a free month of them all!
Put a sticker with a fake PIN on your debit card. If lost and someone tries to use it 3+ times, the card will be eaten.
Have a problem with not remembering if you took your pills or not? Flip the bottle every time you take them.
Shoes smell like crap? Use dryer sheets as an incredibly effective shoe deodorizer.
If you drop an earring, ring, or small screw simply turn off the lights and look with a flashlight. They'll light right up.
If you chew gum when you study a subject and then chew the same flavor when you the take the test it can help you remember.
When proofreading, read out loud to yourself. Your mouth will catch errors your mind might glance over.
You can clear a room full of cigarette smoke in about a minute simply by spinning a wet towel around.
Don't have a coin to flip? Look at the time. If it's even, heads. If it's odd, tails.
Want to meet girls? Go outside when its raining with a huge umbrella and take your pick.
Start your day by thinking positive thoughts and you will have a positive day.
Take notes on your professors political ideologies and use this to your advantage when writing essays.
When out with friends, place all phones stacked on table. First to check their phone pays the bill!
Rainbow fan: Color in each fan blade a different color (red, green, blue, orange, yellow) for a cool rainbow like effect.
When you blow out candles and they smoke, that smoke is actually wax. If you light the smoke quick enough it will spark the candle back up.
Get invited to a wedding? Set the date as a recurring event in your calendar, so you can wish them a happy anniversary every year.
When a bag of chips is stuck in a vending machine, don't buy the same bag again to unjam it, buy something above it.
When your kids are born, reserve them a good email address. Send them pictures, notes, etc. Give them the password on their 18th birthday.
If there's an annoying customer behind you in the checkout line, you can press all four corners of the credit card machine to have it reset.
Taking a quick nap after learning something new can solidify that memory in your brain.
Take a picture of your fridge on your phone, you'll never struggle to remember what you need to buy at the grocery store!
Clean your ceiling fan with a pillowcase. Place the pillowcase on each blade and wipe it down, catching any of the dust inside of the pillowcase.
Never let anyone photoshop a picture of you. It creates a false sense of self-confidence.
When approaching a door, look for the hinges. If you see them, pull. If not, push. This will help you avoid some embarrassing moments!
If you ever go to a zoo, wear the same colors as the employees do. The animals will come right up to you instead of backing away.
If you are feeling nervous, start chewing gum, your brain will reason that you are not in danger because you would not be eating if you were.
If a girl talks to you about a movie she wants to watch, chances are it's a hint that she wants you to ask her out.
If you want to unseal an envelope easily, put it in the fridge for about an hour.
Instead of going to dinner and a movie, go to the movie first and then dinner. This way at dinner you have something to talk about.
Wash your blankets on the gentle cycle with 2.5 cups of vinegar to leave them fluffy and soft like new. No worries - it won`t smell.
Get a puppy before you decide to have children.
If your area is ever below 32 degrees this winter, go outside and blow bubbles! They instantly turn to ice!
Take note of your bodies sleeping position in the morning. This is probably your most comfortable sleeping position. Knowing this can help you get to sleep quicker!
Need to tell a believable lie? Include an embarrassing detail nobody doubts a story that makes you look dumb.
If someone is tailgating you turn on your windshield wiper fluid. It'll fly back and squirt them.
Didn't finish your paper? Copy and paste a bunch of random symbols in a Word document and send it. Your teacher will think the file was damaged.
Create a phone contact called 'ignore' and make the ring tone of that contact silent. Add in whoever you don't want to talk to.
Eating chocolate while studying will help the brain retain new information more easily, and has been directly linked to higher test scores.
Contrary to popular belief-thinking of the future is usually what keeps people up at night; thinking of the past can actually help you sleep.
Insert a drinking straw into a ketchup bottle to make it flow out faster.
Unsure of what to get them for their birthday? Ask them, `Guess what I got you?`. There you go! Ideas!
Always check your cell signal when looking for new apartments or dorms to live in.
When you have kids, watch the movie '2012' with them. Tell them that you survived that.
If you suspect someone's checking you out, yawn. If they yawn back, they were (yawning is visually contagious!).
On Supercook.com you just enter what ingredients you have and it tells you what meals you can make and how you can make them.
Getting a call from a telemarketer? Don't say anything, just press '9' on your phone, it'll add your number to the 'don`t call' list.
Use a spring from an old pen to keep your charger from bending or breaking
When you feel like you need something, but you can't figure out what it is, it's water. It's always water.
When on a date, the best way to judge a person's character is to see how they treat waiters and waitresses.
If you are having trouble falling asleep, count backwards from 99. Most times you will fall asleep before even getting to 50.
When doing your nails, use Elmer's glue around your nail, let it dry, go crazy with paint and then peel off the glue.
Respect your parents. They passed school without Google!
It's actually better to take exams on an empty stomach because hunger makes you better able to focus.
Four words to get free alcohol at a Party: I've never been drunk.
Fold your receipt around the gift card to always know your balance.
Secretaries, tech support and janitors are the true power in an office. Make friends, remember birthdays and you can get anything you need!
Taking notes on the computer? Use a weird font. Studies have shown the uniqueness will make you more likely to remember them!
Playing Tetris can increase brainpower by almost 150%.
You are more likely to remember something you have written in blue ink than something you have written in black ink.
You can order Starbucks drinks at 'kids temperature' and the drink will be much cooler, saving you a burnt tongue!
Remove negative people from your life. The people you spend time with influence your attitude, thoughts and success more than you think.
Has your champagne lost its bubbly-ness? Drop a raisin in and watch the bubbles magically return.
If you ever get kidnapped and they put tape over your mouth, just lick the tape until it falls off.
Leave the recipient field blank when composing an email until you are ready to send your message.
Deodorant on an insect bite or other itchy site will stop the itch.
Want to park somewhere you're not allowed to park? Keep the envelope from a parking ticket & put it under your windshield wipers.
When leaving heavy/bulky items in your shopping cart, position them with the bar codes facing up. The cashier will really appreciate it.
Instead of using chemicals to fix your faces complexion, drink a fruit smoothie everyday with original Greek yogurt.
If someone tells you they had a crush on you in highschool they usually still do.
Want to find a job after college? Be friends with as many people as possible in your field but on pace to graduate 1-2 years ahead of you.
Study your notes within one day of taking them. Retention rates are 60% higher then!
If you're giving a big presentation, have a friend ask you a set question. This way, you'll look like you know your stuff really well.
Open your bag of chips from the bottom, as most of the flavor has sunk there.
There are two rules to success... 1. Never reveal everything you know.
If someone says 'I love you' and you do not feel the same way, just say 'I love YouTube' really fast.
Going to the beach? Put your phone in a sandwich bag and you'll still be able to use the touch screen!
Put a sticker with a fake PIN number on your debit card. If you lose it and someone tries to use it 3+ times, the machine will eat the card.
Get a flat tire? Take a picture of it on your phone. For future reference, you can text that picture to people as a great excuse!
Sprinkle salt on a napkin before putting a drink on it to prevent the drink from sticking.
Tell people to pick a number between 12 and 5; 95% of people choose 7 (because they automatically subtract it).
Life Tip: Before you diagnose yourself with depression or low self-esteem, first make sure that you are not, in fact, just surrounded by assholes.
Don't want the person you are calling to know that it's you? Dial *67 before the number and he/she won't have a clue.
Go to youtube.com/disco and enter in an Artists name and YouTube will auto arrange a playlist based on uploads of that artist.
Put that you were Times 2006 person of the year on your Resume/CV. In 2006, Time made 'Everyone' the person of the year.
Life Tip: Life begins outside your comfort zone.
Buy a world map shower curtain. You will become a geography expert from all the time you spend in the bathroom!
The key to confidence is walking into a room and assuming everyone likes you.
If you are ever homeless, spend whatever money you have on a 24 hour gym membership. You will have a place to go at night, showers, etc.
Stressed? Try eating a cup of lowfat yogurt. The amino acids will help to calm you down.
When you are finished with an essay, copy and paste it into Google Translate and listen to it. It is the easiest way to find mistakes.
Listening to your favorite song before bed can help you sleep better, wake up easier and enhance your mood for the upcoming day.
If you accidentally get ink on your clothes, spray hairspray on the stain and it will come right off.
Send a nice gift to your partner anonymously. If they dont say anything, they are probably cheating.
Your shoes are the first thing people subconciously notice about you. Wear nice shoes.
Mixing alcohol with diet coke will get you more drunk than mixing it with regular coke.
Eating mangoes before smoking marijuana can heighten it's effects.
Touching someones shoulder or arm while asking them out increases their chances of saying yes.
When going on a date, go to a horror film. Elevated heart rate and adrenaline is strongly tied to sexual attraction.
If you are giving a big speech, bring a bottle of water up with you. Take a drink whenever you need to collect your thoughts.
Singing in the shower boosts your immunity, lowers your blood pressure, reduces stress, and improves your mood.
The best way to get someone to confess to something? Remain silent. They'll talk simply due to being uncomfortable.
Hartz flea and tick products are known for killing hundreds of cats and dogs every year. Switch products now if you're using it!
While driving, move your seat as far back as you can while still being able to touch your pedals. This will help prevent speeding.
Going to a bar? Start by giving the bartender a $20 tip. You'll get amazing service the rest of the night.
Studies show that sarcasm enhances the ability of the human mind to solve complex problems.
Microwave two big bowls at the same time by elevating the second bowl with a mug or another small, microwave-safe container.
When moving in, pack heavy items, like your books in a rolling suitcase. Boxes are hard to carry and tend to tear when they are too heavy.
Mimicking the body language of the person you are talking to subconsciously makes them more receptive to you.
Ladies: Want to know if a guy is into you? Pay attention to his voice. Men tend to lower their voices when they are talking to someone they are interested in.
Put glow sticks in a cooler for easy drink grabbing without needing a flashlight.
To prevent loud noises and backsplash in a public restroom, put toilet paper in the toilet beforehand.
Use waxed, unflavored dental floss to cleanly slice a cake.
Taking a quick nap after learning something new can solidify that memory in your brain.
Ripen your avocados quickly by placing them in a brown bag with bananas for 24 hours.
Use an accented letter as your passcode. No one will ever be able to guess it.
Need a better grip on something like a jar, hammer, or screwdriver? Wrap a few rubber bands around it.
Making a blanket fort? Use a fitted sheet instead of a normal blanket for a sturdier and more practical roof.
Need to read a book faster? Place a piece of your favorite candy on each paragraph. When you reach each paragraph you get to eat that piece.
The colours you wear account for 62-90% of someones first impression. People who wear brighter colours tend to do better.
It is actually better to take exams on an empty stomach. Hunger makes you focus better.
The quality of wine can be measured through the weight of its bottle. The heavier the better.
Keep pen thieves away: Put a blue ink cartridge in a red pen. No one steals red pens.
You can make your handwriting neater simply by using a lighter grip.
Use the word 'extra' in a compliment. This way it avoids accidentally implying that it's only temporary.
Dont make fun of your girlfriend for liking sappy music and movies. To her, those are love stories about you.
If your teacher catches you on your phone in class, tell them you were adding the homework to your calendar.
When doing long assignments, set a 30 minute timer, and race it. This will prevent you from procrastination.
Grocery stores stack their products by sell-by date, which means the oldest food is in the front. Make sure to always grab food from the back.
When you want to put a two-liter bottle of soda away, shake it up a little bit first. It will stay fizzy for weeks.
Boiling water before freezing it will give you crystal clear ice.
Wrap rubber bands around the ends of coat hangers to prevent dresses from slipping off.
Studies show that having plants where you study/do homework can help you think more clearly and recall more information. This is due to that fact that our brains benefit from the exposure to nature.
For the best sound in a movie theater, sit two-thirds of the way back and as close to the middle as possible. This is where audio engineers sit when they mix sound for movies.
Get a study partner with blue eyes. Studies show that blue-eyed individuals study more effectively and tend to perform better on exams.
Fruit fly problem? Put some fruit or honey in a cup and cover it with plastic wrap. Poke a few holes on top and watch your problem disappear.
It may sound absurd but looking at pictures of cute baby animals has been proven to increase concentration and productivity by up to 44%.
When taking an exam, always try and sit as close to the professor as possible. You'll pick up all the answers to questions other students come up to ask.
Wearing a tie on a windy day? Slip a coin down the inside of the hem to stop it from blowing all around.
To exit a maze (in a game or real), touch your hand to the right wall & keep walking like that. You'll eventually reach the exit.
Being able to instantly respond with sarcasm within seconds of a stupid question is a sign of a smart and healthy brain.
Put glow-in-the-dark paint on your phone charger, so you will never fumble in the dark for it again.
One of the best ways to study is to pretend that you are going to have to teach the material.
If you want good running form, try to run as quietly as possible. You will be able to run faster and longer.
Turn any cord into a coil cord by wrapping it tightly around a pen and blow-drying it for two to three minutes.
If you want to remember your dreams, try drinking half a glass of water before and after sleeping.
If you are trying to hold back a laugh, try to exhale air as much as possible and hold your breath.
Moving into your dorm room and need boxes to pack. Go to a local liquor store. They will have tons of boxes that can hold good weight.
Trying to eat less? Use a smaller plate. It tricks your mind into thinking there is more food, and also limits what you can pile onto your plate.
Being surrounded by the color yellow helps you stay focused. Yellow decreases the production of Melatonin, a hormone which makes you sleepy.
Put sprinkles in the bottom of the ice cream cone to prevent leaks.
When moving or redecorating, take a picture of the back of your TV or tech equipment to easily remember how everything hooks up.
When you meet someone for the first time at a party, skip awkward introductions by asking things like 'What's new with you?'
Color the top edge of your post it notes with a marker so you will always know which side is the sticky. Meaning no more accidental upside down or sideways notes.
An old CD spindle makes for the perfect bagel holder. They are great for packing lunches.
Pimple too painful to pop? Put it under hot water for a few seconds. This softens it and makes it easier to pop.
Getting the right amount of sleep is crucial for your immune system. Sleeping for more than nine hours at a time can actually damage it!
When trying to look for percentages (ex 40% of 300) drop the 1st digit of the number and multiply by the 10s digit of the % (4 x 30 = 120).
Psychologists say that when meeting someone for the first time, you only have about 7 seconds to make a powerful first impression. So make it count!
Writing something out is the memory equivalent of reading it seven times. A good tip to know when studying.
Put a magnet behind your light switch for a simple, yet awesome, way to hold your keys.
Studying for 30-50 minutes at a time (with 10 minute breaks in between) is the most effective way to retain information.
If you are about to get hit by a car (& cannot jump sideways), jump UP! It will give you a better chance of rolling over the car.
If you are talking with someone and you are not sure if they're interested, fold your arms. If they do the same, they probably are.
Trying to quit smoking? Buy the cheapest, most disgusting cigarettes you can and smoke those. It will help your willpower.
